name: Gravity Odyssey (LiJiayii)
description:
Team members: Li Jiayi, Yin Pengfei, Chen Xinghan

*The game language is currently only available in Chinese, but it does not prevent play：just use WASD to move

This is a space game based on the prototype of the Interstellar story, the player as an astronaut needs to complete the task of collecting information around the black hole and return to Earth to reunite with his daughter. Due to the gravitational force around the black hole, the player and his daughter have different time flow, the player needs to always be careful not to let the time flow too fast, resulting in his daughter aging before the player. According to your age when returning to Earth, there will be multiple endings.
